name: Terrible FPS Idea The Game
description:
Made for the 7 day FPS 2014 game jam. There's probably a good reason most first person shooters aren't "sequential/turn based" based like this. I wanted to play around with seeing how a grid-based, segmented, "turn based" (sorta, everyone moves at once though) game would feel like in first person.

It was a fun experiment...even if it is pretty terrible. Made with Unreal 4

Requires 2013 c++ redistributable:

http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.as...

And DirectX:

http://www.microsoft.com/en-US/download/details.as...

Executable is located in: YOURFOLDER\WindowsNoEditor\wtfville\Binaries\Win64\wtfville.exe
